metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))

metrics.name: Production orders overdue for status closed
metrics.description: Number of open overdue production orders which are technically closed

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${i2c_s4hc_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		 AND ${i2c_s4hc_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Automatic payment block removal
metrics.description: Number of invoices where payment blocks where removed by non-dialog users

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metricVariables.name: itp_remove_payment_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the removal of a payment block for an invoice, for example 'Remove Payment Block'

metricVariables.name: itp_automatic_condition_nested
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was manual, for example "Event Created By User Type" MATCHES('Dialog')

metricVariables.name: itp_invoice_payment_terms
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the invoice payment terms in days, for example "Last Inv. Item Net Payment Terms Period"
metricVariables.value: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Days 1"

metricVariables.name: itp_purchase_order_payment_terms
metricVariables.description: Attribute referring to the purchase order payment terms in days, for example "PO Net Payment Days"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "AR_LastClearingDate"

metricVariables.name: i2c_s4hc_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "AR_LastNetDueDate"

metricVariables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricVariables.name: itp_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: itp_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricVariables.name: mots_prod_order_item_status
metricVariables.description: Attribute for production order item status, for example: "ProdOrderItemStatus"

metricVariables.name: mots_prod_order_item_status_teco
metricVariables.description: Condition for only technically closed production order items, for example: 'TECO'

metricVariables.name: mots_prod_order_item_status_clsd_dlfl
metricVariables.description: Condition for closed production order items or production order items with deletion flag, for example: 'CLSD','DLFL'

metricVariables.name: mots_prod_order_scheduled_finish_date
metricVariables.description: Scheduled finish date for production orders, for example: "ProdOrderSchedFinishDate"

metricVariables.name: mots_scheduled_finish_overdue_period
metricVariables.description: Reference period for overdue production orders by scheduled finish date, for example: '1days'
